text: Play a compilation album. It is by the progressive house artist deadmau5. The album consists of several deadmau5 tracks from his earlier releases, as well as collaborations with Melleefresh. The album cover includes the '10 Full Length DJ Friendly Tracks' message. That is typical of the At Play series. == Track listing == == References == * Amazon.co.uk: At Play Category:2008 albums Category:Deadmau5 albums
title: At Play
